params.newOfficiant: The address to be added as an officiant.

params.carvingId: The unique ID of the carving.
params.properties: Metadata for the carving (e.g., display styles).
params.signature: The ECDSA signature from an officiant.

params.officiant: The address to be removed from officiant roles.

params.carvingId: The unique ID of the carving to be removed from the gallery.

returns._0: gallery An array of carving IDs.

params.carvingId: The unique ID of the carving to be publicized.
The unique ID of the carving.

returns._0: The properties and message associated with the carving ID.

params.carvingId: The unique ID of the carving to be removed.
params.signature: The ECDSA signature from an officiant.

carve(bytes32,bytes32,string,bytes).notice: Stores a new carving in the contract with relayer validation.

gallery(uint256).notice: Array to store public gallery carving IDs.

galleryNonces(bytes32).notice: Tracks the nonce for each carving ID (to prevent replay attacks in gallery actions).

hide(bytes32,bytes).notice: Removes a carving from the public gallery.

officiants(address).notice: Mapping to manage officiant roles. Officiants can carve and remove.

peruse().notice: Returns the list of all public carvings in the gallery.

publicize(bytes32,bytes).notice: Adds a carving to the public gallery.

read(bytes32).notice: Retrieves a carving by its unique ID.

scratch(bytes32,bytes).notice: Removes a carving from the contract with relayer validation.
